document.full_text: consumer spending at u.s. meat counters is steady to up slightly over the past two years as worries about the economy and high unemployment have waned, according to surveys presented wednesday at a meat industry convention.
document.title: confident consumers still spending on meat: surveys
lines_and_colors: consumer spending at u.s. meat counters is steady to up slightly over the past two years as worries about the economy and high unemployment have waned, according to surveys presented wednesday at a meat industry convention.
